About
Joseph Martinez has been giving workshops and developing learning material for empathetic and Nonviolent Communication since 2015. He has given workshops and trainings to numerous organizations internationally both in person and online. His demeanor is best suited for companies, startups, and teams that are apprehensive of personal and leadership development programs in general and want a fresh approach. Joseph uses his experience as a full-stack software engineer to build the tools he uses in workshops and training programs.

built by josephm.dev
